mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_ID ,SHIPPING_ORDER_NO ,CARGO_NAME ,date_format(SHIPPING_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SHIPPING_DATE ,SENDER_NAME ,FROM_LOCATION ,TO_LOCATION ,ORDER_STATUS ,date_format(ORDER_RECEPT_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS ORDER_RECEPT_TIME ,SENDER_PHONE ,RECEIVER_PHONE ,RECEIVER_NAME FROM ORDER_INFO WHERE ORDER_ID=#{orderId}

SELECT ORDER_ID ,SHIPPING_ORDER_NO ,CARGO_NAME ,date_format(SHIPPING_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SHIPPING_DATE ,SENDER_NAME ,FROM_LOCATION ,TO_LOCATION ,ORDER_STATUS ,date_format(ORDER_RECEPT_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS ORDER_RECEPT_TIME ,SENDER_PHONE ,RECEIVER_PHONE ,RECEIVER_NAME FROM ORDER_INFO WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} ORDER BY SHIPPING_DATE DESC
SELECT ORDER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_MSG, UPDATE_STATUS FROM SHIPPING_RECORDS WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId} ORDER BY UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_INFO ( ORDER_ID, SHIPPING_ORDER_NO, CARGO_NAME, SHIPPING_DATE, SENDER_NAME, FROM_LOCATION, TO_LOCATION, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_RECEPT_TIME, SENDER_PHONE, RECEIVER_PHONE, RECEIVER_NAME) VALUES( #{orderId}, #{shippingOrderNo}, #{cargoName}, str_to_date(#{shippingDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{senderName}, #{fromLocation}, #{toLocation}, #{orderStatus}, str_to_date(#{orderReceptTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{senderPhone}, #{receiverPhone}, #{receiverName})
INSERT INTO SHIPPING_RECORDS ( ORDER_ID, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_MSG, UPDATE_STATUS) VALUES( #{orderId}, str_to_date(#{updateTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{updateMsg}, #{updateStatus})
